descriptionarticle.text: Decide whether or not to emit a warning or trace message.

parameters.parameter:
The message severity level.
Values are: -1: recoverable corrupt-data warning, may want to abort. 0: important advisory messages (always display to user). 1: first level of tracing detail. 2, 3, ...: successively more detailed tracing messages.
